title: Tile Matrix Set Definition
description: A definition of a tile matrix set following the Tile Matrix Set standard. For tileset metadata, this property is only required for offline use, as an alternative to tileMatrixSetURI and tileMatrixSetDefinition.

title.description: Title of this tile matrix set, normally used for display to a human
examples: Google Maps Compatible for the World

description.description: Brief narrative description of this tile matrix set, normally available for display to a human
examples: The most common TileMatrixSet, used in most of the main IT map browsers. It was initially popularized by Google Maps

keywords.description: Unordered list of one or more commonly used or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe this tile matrix set

id.description: Tile matrix set identifier. Implementation of 'identifier'

uri.description: Reference to an official source for this tileMatrixSet

wellKnownScaleSet.description: Reference to a well-known scale set

boundingBox.description: Minimum bounding rectangle surrounding the tile matrix set, in the supported CRS

tileMatrices.description: Describes scale levels and its tile matrices

title.description: Title of this tile matrix set, normally used for display to a human
examples: Google Maps Compatible for the World zoom level 3

description.description: Brief narrative description of this tile matrix set, normally available for display to a human
examples: Google Maps Compatible zoom level 3 that is equivalent to a scale of 1:69885283.00358972 and has 19567.87924100512 meters of pixel size in the equator

keywords.description: Unordered list of one or more commonly used or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe this dataset

id.description: Identifier selecting one of the scales defined in the TileMatrixSet and representing the scaleDenominator the tile. Implementation of 'identifier'

scaleDenominator.description: Scale denominator level of this tile matrix

cellSize.description: Cell size of this tile matrix

cornerOfOrigin.description: Position of the corner of origin with respect of the tiles of this tile matrix

pointOfOrigin.description: Coordinate in CRS coordinates of the corner of origin of this tile matrix. In previous version was 'topLeftCorner' and 'cornerOfOrigin' did not exist

tileWidth.description: Width of each tile of this tile matrix in pixels

tileHeight.description: Height of each tile of this tile matrix in pixels

matrixHeight.description: Width of the matrix (number of tiles in width)

matrixWidth.description: Height of the matrix (number of tiles in height)

variableMatrixWidths.description: Describes the rows that has variable matrix width

minTileRow.description: First tile row where the coalese factor apply on this tilematrix

maxTileRow.description: Last tile row where the coalese factor apply on this tilematrix
